item.title: Plugins
item.description: Introduction linkSputter supports a plugin system that allows for loading new data sources (i.e. adapters) and publish targets. To build a plugin, create a new class library, add a reference to Sputter.Core, and add a class implementing the IPlugin interface (from Sputter.Composition). In the ConfigureServices method, you can register any services your plugin needs, and also register any types for Sputter to load.
